name: Kudan
overview:
Kudan develops Augmented Reality (AR) technology for mobile devices. We provide a service to agencies and direct to brands to strategically apply augmented reality to ad campaigns. Our technology integrates into existing mobile applications or stands-alone. We deliver a new level of brand engagement to target consumers whilst giving brands the ability to track user behaviour and consumer interest like never before.

We work with a range of AR technologies including our own platform, applying them to both marketing and product applications to deliver return on investment for our clients. We are passionate about applying this potentially confusing technology sensitively considering overall brand strategy and long lasting benefit to consumers, brands and agencies alike.

Our proprietary technology combined with our expert knowledge allow us to support agencies and brands from initial mobile strategy through to campaign planning and implementation.
